name: RFL_REF_TO_REGIONS
description: This table holds the list of geographical areas for referred to geographical steering in Referral and Order Entry. It will only be populated if the "Use Referred to Geographic Areas" Referral system definition is set to Yes.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the referral.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REF_TO_AREAS_ID_AREA_NAME
columns.description: The name of the geograpic region
